umm.event_type: Special information - Details given in remarks below
umm.remarks:
Due to high wind energy feed in germany the capacities will be as followed
00:00 - 09:00 h DE to SE4 = 600 MW/North
09:00 - 10:00 h DE to SE4 = 300 MW/North
10:00 - 11:00 h DE to SE4 = 250 MW/North
11:00 - 12:00 h DE to SE4 = 225 MW/North
12:00 - 14:00 h DE to SE4 = 200 MW/North
14:00 - 19:00 h DE to SE4 = 175 MW/North
19:00 - 20:00 h DE to SE4 = 200 MW/North
20:00 - 21:00 h DE to SE4 = 225 MW/North
21:00 - 22:00 h DE to SE4 = 250 MW/North
22:00 - 23:00 h DE to SE4 = 275 MW/North
23:00 - 23:59 h DE to SE4 = 300 MW/North
00:00 - 11:07 h SE4 to DE = 610 MW/South
11:07 - 13:00 h SE4 to DE = 550 MW/South (reduced)
13:00 - 23:59 h SE4 to DE = 610 MW/South
umm.status: Approved and does not have a Followup
